text: Silvia Pinal Hidalgo (12 September 1931 - 28 November 2024) was a Mexican actress and producer. She was one of the most recognized and versatile Mexican actresses. She was known for her roles in Shark! (1969), Viridiana (1961), El ángel exterminador (1962) and Simón del desierto (1965). Pinal died on 28 November 2024 at a hospital in Mexico City from problems caused by a urinary tract infection, aged 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:People from Sonora Category:Deaths from urinary tract infection Category:Singers from Mexico City Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Politicians from Mexico City
title: Silvia Pinal
